pages.text: Sieving Dust and using the Diamond Mesh Mesh will output:$(br)-Bone Meal: 0.15, 0.075$(br)-Fluix Dust: 0.1$(br)-Redstone Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Sky Stone Dust: 0.08$(br)-Glowstone Dust: 0.075$(br)-Gunpowder: 0.05$(br)-Inferium Essence: 0.05$(br)-Yellorium Dust: 0.05$(br)-Flux dust: 0.02$(br)-Platinum Dust: 0.012$(br)-Bismuth Dust: 0.01 $(br)-Certus Quartz Dust: 0.01
